profile.description:
A year ago I joined this new world of IT.
It really is something exciting, I really like to continue developing myself a little more each time in what I already know as well as learning new things.
I would like some day it will be me who helps others in these first steps.

proyects.first-proyect-description: Carrying out a group project with 6 colleagues using the scrum methodology to create an e-commerce website for sportswear products.
proyects.first-proyect-description2: Functions: List of products-Detail of them-Create a new product by the administrator-Third-party login- User profile-Administrator actions: create a new administrator- ban a client- disable a product due to stock- stock inquiry- inquiry of orders made-Cart-Payment route.
